1.text: Use a square bandana to form an even headband.

2.text: Lay the bandana flat and smooth out any wrinkles.

3.text: Bring the bottom corner to meet the top corner to form a triangle.
3.vid: /5/5b/Tie a Bandana Like a Headband Step 3 Version 6.360p.mp4

4.text: Fold the long end of the triangle to make a long strip.
4.vid: /4/4b/Tie a Bandana Like a Headband Step 4 Version 4.360p.mp4

5.text: Spray the folded bandana with hairspray.
5.vid: /e/eb/Tie a Bandana Like a Headband Step 5 Version 6.360p.mp4

6.text: Place the center of the bandana against your forehead.

7.text: Wrap the two ends of the bandana around the back of your head.
7.vid: /3/3a/Tie a Bandana Like a Headband Step 7 Version 6.360p.mp4

8.text: Tie the ends of the bandana into a double knot to form a headband.
8.vid: /b/bc/Tie a Bandana Like a Headband Step 8 Version 6.360p.mp4

9.text: Make any adjustments and smooth out any wrinkles in your headband.
